title: The 2025 Millionaire Blueprint: Ethereum Price Prediction 2025 Experts Pivot to Bitcoin Solaris for Superior Returns
body: The post The 2025 Millionaire Blueprint: Ethereum Price Prediction 2025 Experts Pivot to Bitcoin Solaris for Superior Returns appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ethereum’s position as a top-tier blockchain asset remains unchallenged in many ways. However, recent market patterns, slowing transaction throughput, and rising competition have analysts and investors asking a hard question: Is Ethereum still the most promising vehicle for life-changing returns? According to a growing chorus of experts analyzing 2025 crypto forecasts, a shift is already happening. While Ethereum continues consolidating above $2,500, many analysts are now turning their attention to Bitcoin Solaris (BTC-S)—a next-generation project they claim may offer superior ROI potential, greater accessibility, and unmatched scalability. Ethereum’s 2025 Outlook: Strong, but Capped? Ethereum has recently stabilized, defending support above $2,500 after struggling to break out from the $2,700 zone. While technical indicators such as a slight MACD bullish crossover and RSI nearing 50 suggest strength may return, the lack of strong volume is a concern. Even bullish price forecasts hover around $6,000–$7,500 by 2025. Yes, Ethereum remains vital to DeFi and Web3. But investors seeking exponential upside, especially those priced out of ETH’s current levels, are starting to look elsewhere. Enter Bitcoin Solaris: A New Wealth Blueprint Bitcoin Solaris (BTC-S) is designed for one thing: to become the next-generation alternative to Bitcoin and Ethereum, offering real wealth-building potential without the high entry barriers or technical complexity. While Ethereum evolves slowly through layer-2 solutions, Bitcoin Solaris launches with a dual-consensus architecture that blends Proof-of-Work (PoW) for base-layer security and Delegated Proof-of-Stake (DPoS) for fast, energy-efficient smart contract execution. The result? A chain capable of 10,000 transactions per second with 2-second finality—blazing past Ethereum and Ripple. Unlike Ethereum’s gas-fee woes, BTC-S boasts 99.95% lower energy consumption than Bitcoin and no bottlenecks. Plus, it’s designed to support mining from common devices like smartphones and laptops, removing technical hurdles and empowering everyday users. It’s no surprise, then, that top influencers are paying attention. Crypto Legends praised Bitcoin Solaris as “the next evolution of Bitcoin.” Meanwhile, Crypto Dex World praised Bitcoin Solaris as ‘a must-have project for serious investors’. Your Smartphone Just Became a Crypto Powerhouse—Start with BTC-S Not Just Technology—A Movement Bitcoin Solaris isn’t just promising speed or DeFi compatibility. It’s building a movement for fair access. The upcoming Solaris Nova app, though not yet available, is being developed to allow mining on mobile and desktop devices, inviting first-time investors into a world that was once only accessible to crypto elites. Security is also a core pillar. Bitcoin Solaris has successfully passed two independent audits—one by Cyberscope and another by Freshcoins —along with a KYC certification via Freshcoins , giving early participants confidence in the project’s legitimacy and transparency. Why Analysts See BTC-S as the Better Play for 2025 Lower entry price and higher upside potential compared to ETH Built-in scalability from day one—no reliance on rollups or upgrades More inclusive mining is designed for non-technical users Fixed 21M supply like Bitcoin, enabling long-term value retention Immediate Solana compatibility, with 1:1 token migration to the Bitcoin Solaris native chain once live The Clock Is Ticking Bitcoin Solaris is in Phase 5 of its presale, with a current price of $5. The next price increase takes it to $6, and the launch is set for $20. With over 11,000 unique users and $1.2M+ already raised, the momentum is undeniable. And with only weeks left until the July 31, 2025, cutoff, this is one of the shortest, most high-impact presales on record. Final Thoughts Ethereum will always have a place in the crypto ecosystem, but its growth curve may already be priced in. For those seeking outsized returns in 2025 and beyond, Bitcoin Solaris offers a clean slate: strong tech, low energy use, real accessibility, and an explosive upside. The future of wealth building may not lie in chasing legacy tokens but in pivoting early to the next breakout chain. title: BlackRock to join Telegram’s $1.5B bond sale: WSJ
body: BlackRock, one of the world’s largest Bitcoin holders, is reportedly participating in a bond raise by crypto-friendly messenger Telegram. Telegram is expected to raise at least $1.5 billion in a bond issue on May 28, with support from existing backers like BlackRock and Abu Dhabi’s investment firm Mubadala, The Wall Street Journal reported . As part of the sale, Telegram is offering investors five-year bonds at a 9% yield, the report said, citing sources familiar with the matter. Telegram plans to use the proceeds to buy back remaining debt from bonds issued in 2021, which are due to mature in March 2026. Discounts for potential Telegram IPO Apart from existing Telegram bondholders like BlackRock and Mubadala, the sale is also expected to bring new investors, including the US hedge fund firm Citadel. The WSJ report came weeks after Bloomberg first reported on Telegram's bond sale in late April, with sources claiming that the company was holding investor meetings about a bond sale worth about $2 billion to refinance its debut debt offering from 2021. According to the Financial Times, Telegram’s new bond offering will allow investors to buy shares in a potential initial public offering at a 20% discount, mirroring the terms of previous bond sales. This is a developing story; further information will be added as it becomes available. Magazine: Bitcoin bears eye $69K, CZ denies WLF ‘fixer’ rumors: Hodler’s Digest, May 18 – 24

title: Xaman Wallet Offers Instant XRP and RLUSD Swaps. Here’s Why This is Good for XRP
body: Xaman Wallet, a prominent self-custodial wallet built for the XRP Ledger (XRPL), has introduced a decentralized swap feature that enables users to exchange any asset available on the XRPL, including XRP and RLUSD, directly from the wallet’s home screen within seconds. This new functionality, highlighted in a recent post on X, streamlines interaction with the XRPL decentralized exchange (DEX) and automated market makers (AMM), making asset swapping more accessible and efficient for users. Swapping XRP RLUSD in a few seconds? Xaman’s decentralized swap functionality allows you to swap any asset available on the XRPL in just a few seconds right from your @XamanWallet home screen. It’s a seamless way to interact with the ecosystem while leveraging the XRPL DEX. pic.twitter.com/2q2xTCTMsB — Xaman® Wallet (@XamanWallet) May 26, 2025 Simplifying Access to XRPL Assets The new swap feature from Xaman Wallet offers a seamless way for users to interact with the XRPL ecosystem by enabling instant swaps of XRP, RLUSD, and other assets on the ledger. Users can perform these swaps directly from the wallet’s home screen without using external platforms. This ease of use reduces friction in trading and asset management, encouraging more users to engage with XRP and the broader ecosystem. It is particularly valuable for users seeking efficient asset exchanges without delays or complex procedures, reinforcing XRP’s position as a practical and accessible digital asset. The Importance Of Advanced Self-Custody Wallets Xaman offers one of the top self-custody wallets in the crypto space, making it an appealing product to many XRP holders. Edoardo Farina, a well-respected crypto personality, recently warned XRP holders to learn from the infamous Mt. Gox collapse and move their tokens out of centralized exchanges. Xaman’s rapidly improving self-custody wallet is the perfect alternative to centralized storage, and this decentralized swap feature could enhance its appeal and attract more investors seeking control of their assets to the XRP ecosystem. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Xaman’s Progress and Innovations In 2025, Xaman has prioritized enhancing the user experience and expanding the capabilities of its wallet. The launch of Xaman 4.0 brought significant improvements, including the seamless swap functionality mentioned in the post that allows users to swap any XRPL asset. Xaman’s official blog post revealed that this update accelerated the onboarding process by 10x, enabling users to create or import accounts and begin transacting in just a few seconds. Despite some recent issues , Xaman has come out strong, introducing performance optimizations to make the wallet faster and more responsive, with real-time updates improving navigation and transaction speed. Additionally, Xaman integrated MoonPay, allowing users worldwide to purchase XRP and RLUSD directly within the wallet using various payment methods. This integration simplifies the process of acquiring XRPL assets and supports broader ecosystem growth. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice.
